headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Bonus Buried Treasure
content:
Tourists and treasure-hunters visiting Cayo Perico this week should keep an eye out for Treasure Chests while Scoping and when on their final approach, as collecting both Treasure Chests within a single day this week will earn you an extra GTA$100K when you log in next week.

Please allow up to 72 hours after logging in next week for the deposit to clear in your Maze Bank account.
